title: Slow Cooker Beef Vegetable Stew Recipe Read Reviews (19) Be the first to add a review 5 19 20
directions: Place the beef, potatoes, water, carrots, soup, onion, celery, Worcestershire sauce, browning sauce if desired, bouillon granules, garlic, sugar, salt and pepper in a 5- or 6-qt. slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender.
Combine cornstarch and cold water in a small bowl until smooth; gradually stir into stew. Stir in peas. Cover and cook on high for 30 minutes or until thickened. Yield: 8 servings (3 quarts).
ingredients: 1-1/2 pounds boneless beef chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed tomato soup, undiluted
